headline: NetExperience Appoints Jack Raynor as President to Accelerate OpenWiFi Growth and Innovation
summary: NetExperience, a leader in open-source Wi-Fi solutions, today announced the appointment of Jack Raynor as its new President. This strategic leadership move underscores the company's focus on expanding its managed enterprise wireless solutions and solidifying its position as the premier network management platform for disaggregated Wi-Fi systems.

headline: AI Unicorn FuriosaAI With $246M In Funding Teams With OpenAI To Run 120B Model On Just 2 Cards While GPUs Struggle
summary: FuriosaAI, South Korea’s newest AI unicorn with $246 million in total funding, partnered with OpenAI at the grand opening of the AI giant’s Seoul office on Sept. 11 to deliver a live demonstration of enterprise-ready sustainable AI. The semiconductor startup showcased OpenAI‘s gpt-oss 120B model running in real time on just two RNGD — pronounced "Renegade" — cards using MXFP4 precision, demonstrating that large-scale AI models can operate within the power budgets of typical enterprise data cente

headline: Heard on the Street Tuesday Recap: The Fed’s in a Tight Spot
summary: The Dow industrials, S&P 500 and Nasdaq composite all fell, despite some decent gains by megacap names like Amazon, Meta and Tesla.  Suspense is building ahead of the Federal Reserve's interest-rate decision.  Stronger retail sales may complicate the case for numerous rate cuts if central bankers believe inflation is still a risk.
